title: What is telesthesia and how does it relate to perception beyond the physical body?
first_phrase: In the preceding text, Lo Schema n. 9 discussed the experience of telesthesia or telepathic sensory reception outside of the body's physical limits. Lo Schema n. 10 continues this discussion, focusing on the perception of mental stimuli. It includes phenomena like intellectual intuition, inspiration, and illumination. These experiences occur at higher levels of existence beyond the physical realm. The text emphasizes the importance of recognizing the existence of subtle energy fields and their impact on human perception.

last_phrase: In conclusion, by achieving a state of separation between the subtle and the dense, individuals can directly perceive processes and vibrations of other energy fields and their respective nuclei. Such experiences can lead to the perception of purely psychic forces and realities, beyond the physical realm. However, it is important to note that these beings and forces may not have visible or tangible manifestations in the physical fields, but that does not make them any less real. Achieving this level of perception requires a rare level of consciousness that not everyone may be able to attain.
